no_content: Your request was processed successfully, but no data was returned.
bad_request: Sorry, we couldn't process your request. Please check your information and try again.
forbidden: You don't have permission to access this resource. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
unauthorised: Please log in again to continue. Your session may have expired.
not_found: We couldn't find what you're looking for. The resource may have been moved or deleted.

connect_timeout: The connection timed out. Please check your internet and try again.
receive_timeout: Taking too long to receive data. Please check your connection and try again.
send_timeout: Taking too long to send data. Please check your connection and try again.
cache_error: There was an issue with the cached data. Please refresh and try again.
no_internet_connection: No internet connection available. Please check your network settings and try again.
unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
